ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Fmo0K99.png[/img]
[h2]Sleepy's Pharmaceuticals - Glitterworld Medicine (v1.0.0)[/h2] A standalone additional to my Sleepy's Pharmaceuticals mod. I love the drug mechanics in this game but I wanted to be able to have more late game drug options.
I love to add content to this game that I feel is missing or that I'd like expanded. I figure that if I enjoy what I've added, others may too so I to post my mods to the workshop. Balance is critical to me as I am a vanilla player and I'll try to ensure nothing is unbalanced but ultimately I have a goal in mind for the content I am adding so what I consider balanced may not always be what you'd consider balanced. Hopefully you enjoy the mod none the less.
You can find the stats of all drugs added by Sleepy's Pharmaceuticals - Glitterworld Medicine here:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/DbnM7jC.png[/img] [b]What Does This Mod Add?[/b] 12 New Pharmaceuticals: - 6 Medical Drugs - 1 Social Drugs - 3 Hard Drugs - 1 Exotic Drugs (Trade or Reward Only)
